settings.instructions:
Challenge yourself to locate the states that would most likely be effected by Mississippi River flooding. Check off the states and select "submit" when you are confident with your choices.
You may view a map of the Mississippi River and surrounding states at any time by selecting the "help" icon.
settings.intro: The Mississippi is flooding! Who needs help?

feedback.correct:
Great job! You must be familiar with U.S. geography! Close this window and examine the map to confirm your choices.
After closing the map, select "next" to continue to the next screen.
feedback.incorrect: Oops, not quite. Close this window and examine the map to see which states border the Mississippi River.
feedback.failed:
Nice try. Close this window to view the correct answers.
Select "next" when you are ready to reset the interactive.
feedback.freebie:
Now you are familiar with U.S. geography!
Close this window and select "reset" to restart the interactive.
